bobby.engine.bobengine

Class Graphic

  • java.lang.Object
    • bobby.engine.bobengine.Graphic

  • public class Graphic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains information about a graphic sheet.
    Version:
    alpha
    Author:
    Ben

    • Constructor Detail

      • Graphic

        public Graphic()
        Set up a default texture.

      • Graphic

        public Graphic(int drawable,
               int height,
               int width,
               int minFilter,
               int magFilter,
               boolean useMipMaps,
               int id)
        Sets up a texture with specific values.
        Parameters:
        width - - The total width of the sheet in pixels.
        height - - The total height of the sheet in pixels.
        minFilter - - OpenGL downscale filter. (eg. GL11.GL_NEAREST)
        magFilter - - OpenGL upscale filter. (eg. GL11.GL_NEAREST)
        useMipMaps - - Should this texture use mipmaps. true for better performance.
        id - - Must be a unique numerical ID for this sheet.
